title: Ranchi man beheads wife, takes her head to the court : FYI, News - India Today
text:
Ranchi man beheads wife, takes her head to the court Bhuban Mardi mercilessly murdered his wife, beheaded her and took the head to the court. IANS | Posted By: Neha Vashishth A + A - Pictiure for Representation (Twitter/@SDogbon) 
A 38-year-old man from Ranchi, known as Bhuban Mardi, was recently arrested for a crime that anyone would term as 'heinous' and 'inhumane'. 
Bhuban beheaded his wife and went to a court with the severed head in Jharkhand's Singhbhum district. 
He was arrested before he reached the court after people saw what he was carrying and alerted the police. He was arrested by the police on Monday. The officials said the murder followed a row between the couple.
